title: Google\Cloud\Optimization\V1\ShipmentTypeRequirement
name: ShipmentTypeRequirement
description:
Specifies requirements between shipments based on their shipment_type.

The specifics of the requirement are defined by the requirement mode.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.optimization.v1.ShipmentTypeRequirement

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.required_shipment_type_alternatives
params.description: List of alternative shipment types required by the dependent_shipment_types.

params.name: data.dependent_shipment_types
params.description: All shipments with a type in the dependent_shipment_types field require at least one shipment of type required_shipment_type_alternatives to be visited on the same route. NOTE: Chains of requirements such that a shipment_type depends on itself are not allowed.

methods.name: getRequiredShipmentTypeAlternatives
methods.description:
List of alternative shipment types required by the dependent_shipment_types.

Generated from protobuf field repeated string required_shipment_type_alternatives = 1;

methods.name: setRequiredShipmentTypeAlternatives
methods.description:
List of alternative shipment types required by the dependent_shipment_types.

Generated from protobuf field repeated string required_shipment_type_alternatives = 1;

params.name: var
params.description: List of alternative shipment types required by the dependent_shipment_types.

methods.name: getDependentShipmentTypes
methods.description:
All shipments with a type in the dependent_shipment_types field require at least one shipment of type required_shipment_type_alternatives to be visited on the same route.

NOTE: Chains of requirements such that a shipment_type depends on itself are not allowed.

Generated from protobuf field repeated string dependent_shipment_types = 2;

methods.name: setDependentShipmentTypes
methods.description:
All shipments with a type in the dependent_shipment_types field require at least one shipment of type required_shipment_type_alternatives to be visited on the same route.

NOTE: Chains of requirements such that a shipment_type depends on itself are not allowed.

Generated from protobuf field repeated string dependent_shipment_types = 2;

params.name: var
params.description:
All shipments with a type in the dependent_shipment_types field require at least one shipment of type required_shipment_type_alternatives to be visited on the same route.

NOTE: Chains of requirements such that a shipment_type depends on itself are not allowed.

methods.description:
Mode applied to the requirement.
